snippet: President Obama and the Senate must make filling the federal judiciary, which has been terribly neglected, a priority in the coming year.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to make fully staffing federal courts important part of his second-term agenda, starting with immediate Senate confirmation of 18 nominees approved by Senate Judiciary Committee; contends duty to fill federal judgeships has been terribly neglected and needs to be priority in coming year (Series: The Second Term).
lead_paragraph: President Obama and the Senate must make filling the federal judiciary, which has been terribly neglected, a priority in the coming year.
